2 #define CAMERA_H
3 
4 #include <glm/glm.hpp>
5 #include <glm/gtc/matrix_transform.hpp>
6 
7 enum Camera_Movement {
8  FORWARD,
9  BACKWARD,
10  LEFT,
11  RIGHT
12 };
13 
14 const float YAW = -90.0f;
15 const float PITCH = 0.0f;
16 const float SPEED = 2.5f;
17 const float SENSITIVITY = 0.1f;
18 const float ZOOM = 45.0f;
19 
20 class Camera {
21 public:
22  glm::vec3 Position;
23  glm::vec3 Front;
24  glm::vec3 Up;
25  glm::vec3 Right;
26  glm::vec3 WorldUp;
27 
28  float Yaw;
29  float Pitch;
30 
31  float MovementSpeed;
32  float MouseSensitivity;
33  float Zoom;
34 
35  Camera(glm::vec3 position = glm::vec3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f), glm::vec3 up = glm::vec3(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f), float yaw = YAW, float pitch = PITCH)
36  : Front(glm::vec3(0.0f, 0.0f, -1.0f)), MovementSpeed(SPEED), MouseSensitivity(SENSITIVITY), Zoom(ZOOM) {
37  Position = position;
38  WorldUp = up;
39  Yaw = yaw;
40  Pitch = pitch;
41  updateCameraVectors();
42  }
43 
44  glm::mat4 GetViewMatrix() {
45  return glm::lookAt(Position, Position + Front, Up);
46  }
47 
48  void ProcessKeyboard(Camera_Movement direction, float deltaTime) {
49  float velocity = MovementSpeed * deltaTime;
50  if (direction == FORWARD)
51  Position += Front * velocity;
52  if (direction == BACKWARD)
53  Position -= Front * velocity;
54  if (direction == LEFT)
55  Position -= Right * velocity;
56  if (direction == RIGHT)
57  Position += Right * velocity;
58  }
59 
60  void ProcessMouseMovement(float xOffset, float yOffset, bool constrainPitch = true) {
61  xOffset *= MouseSensitivity;
62  yOffset *= MouseSensitivity;
63 
64  Yaw += xOffset;
65  Pitch += yOffset;
66 
67  if (constrainPitch) {
68  if (Pitch > 89.0f)
69  Pitch = 89.0f;
70  if (Pitch < -89.0f)
71  Pitch = -89.0f;
72  }
73 
74  updateCameraVectors();
75  }
76 
77  void ProcessMouseScroll(float yOffset) {
78  Zoom -= yOffset;
79  if (Zoom < 1.0f)
80  Zoom = 1.0f;
81  if (Zoom > 45.0f)
82  Zoom = 45.0f;
83  }
84 
85 private:
86  void updateCameraVectors() {
87  glm::vec3 front;
88  front.x = cos(glm::radians(Yaw)) * cos(glm::radians(Pitch));
89  front.y = sin(glm::radians(Pitch));
90  front.z = sin(glm::radians(Yaw)) * cos(glm::radians(Pitch));
91  Front = glm::normalize(front);
92  Right = glm::normalize(glm::cross(Front, WorldUp));
93  Up = glm::normalize(glm::cross(Right, Front));
94  }
95 };
